name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made of silver.
looks: The Silver Sword has a shiny silver blade with a sharp edge. The hilt is decorated with intricate silver engravings, and the handle is wrapped in a black leather grip.

special_weapon_skills.swordfighting: Increases swordfighting skill and accuracy when wielding the Silver Sword.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the spell to cast a powerful fireball.
looks: The Fireball Scroll is made of aged parchment and is tied with a red ribbon. It has intricate runes and symbols inscribed on it, glinting with a faint red glow.

special_effects.fireball_explosion: Causes a small explosion upon impact, dealing additional damage to nearby enemies.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel.
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a single edge and a hilt wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skils.blade: Grants a bonus to Blade skill when wielded.

name: Silver Staff
description: A long staff made from polished silver, imbued with mystical energy.
looks: The Silver Staff is a long, slender staff made entirely of silver. It has a carved crystal orb at the top, which emits a faint glow. Intricate engravings of arcane symbols and runes adorn the entire length of the staff.

special_weapon_skills.mystic_blast: Unleash a powerful blast of pure magical energy.
special_weapon_skills.arcane_shield: Create a protective shield that absorbs magical damage.

name: Sword of the Flame
description: A fearsome sword imbued with the power of fire.
looks: The Sword of the Flame has a blade made of shimmering red metal, with flames swirling along its edges. The hilt is wrapped in black leather, and the pommel is adorned with a fiery gemstone.

special_weapon_skils.sword: Grants a bonus to Sword skill when wielded.

special_effects.fire_attunement: Increases fire damage dealt by the wielder.

name: Steel Sword
description: A longsword made of sturdy steel
looks: The steel sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a silver finish. The hilt is wrapped in leather and has a solid steel pommel.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when equipped.

name: Golden Sword
description: A beautifully-crafted sword made from pure gold.
looks: The Golden Sword is a stunning weapon with an intricately designed hilt and a blade that shimmers in the light. It is adorned with engravings of mythical creatures and has a golden sheen.

special_weapon_skills.sword_mastery: Increases damage and accuracy with swords.

name: Sword of the Dragon
description: A legendary sword forged from the scales of a mighty dragon.
looks: The sword has a curved blade with a dragon-shaped hilt. The blade is made of a shining metal that resembles dragon scales, with intricate engravings along the edges. The hilt is adorned with rubies and has a leather grip.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel.
looks: The steel sword has a polished blade with a silver tint. It has a hilt wrapped in leather for a firm grip.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a boost to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.
